cause.description:
Voter registration, education and mobilization efforts give a voice to the millions of Americans for whom quality, affordable health care and high quality public education are top priorities.
In every election, the power lies with those who vote.
1. Democracy works best when we make our voices heard.
2. Increased voter participation helps us hold elected officials accountable.
cause.mission: Register, educate and mobilize millions of new voters.
cause.name: Get Out The Vote
